messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Jodie Foster, was manipulation and hot dogs, was ...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/23/2005 1:34:40 PM Mountain Standard Time, nellebelle@charter.net writes: We ve  been on a Steve Martin kick.  Best of from Saturday Night
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/23/2005 1:34:40 PM Mountain Standard Time,
nellebelle@... writes:

We've been on a Steve Martin kick. Best of from Saturday Night Live (now
Lisa wants to see the Coneheads movie), Parenthood, and just today, Father of
the Bride. We watched a DVD of the Sonny and Cher show and discovered Steve
Martin there too! Fun!



===========

BOWFINGER!

Especially if your kids have watched Chicago (there's an actress in common)
or if they like Eddie Murphy in addition to Steve Martin.

I've seen Nell, but Holly probably hasn't. I should rent that. Thanks.

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
